coreAttributes.name: shorts
coreAttributes.description: A special pair of shorts that can only be pulled down off-screen. If you can't get the regular shorts outside the debug menu, shit's fucked brah.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the shorts, before pulling them up and fastening the button at [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the shorts, before pulling them up and fastening the button at [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the shorts, before yanking them up and fastening the button at [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc.her] shorts, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc2.namePos] shorts, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the button on [npc2.namePos] shorts, before yanking them off.
